content: Gen. 1:1 This is a study note for Genesis 1:1. It provides commentary and insights on this verse.
Gen. 1:3-5 This is a study note that covers Genesis 1:3-5. It provides commentary on these verses that describe the creation of light and the first day.
Gen. 1:26 This study note explains the significance of 'Let Us make man in Our image.' The plural pronouns indicate the Trinity—Father, Son, and Holy Spirit—in creation.
Gen. 2:7 This note explains how God formed man from the dust of the ground and breathed life into him, showing the special creation of humanity.
Gen. 3:15 This is known as the protoevangelium, or first gospel. It contains the first promise of a Redeemer who would defeat Satan.
